code: @Test public void contextLoads() {     ResponseEntity<String> entity = this.restTemplate.getForEntity("/hello", String.class).     assertThat(entity.getStatusCode()).isEqualTo(HttpStatus.OK). }

@Test public void reverse() {     ResponseEntity<String> entity = this.restTemplate.getForEntity("/reverse?input=olleh", String.class).     assertThat(entity.getStatusCode()).isEqualTo(HttpStatus.OK).     assertThat(entity.getBody()).isEqualTo("hello"). }

@Test public void validation() {     ResponseEntity<String> entity = this.restTemplate.getForEntity("/reverse", String.class).     assertThat(entity.getStatusCode()).isEqualTo(HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST). }

@Test public void actuatorStatus() {     ResponseEntity<String> entity = this.restTemplate.getForEntity("/actuator/health", String.class).     assertThat(entity.getStatusCode()).isEqualTo(HttpStatus.OK).     assertThat(entity.getBody()).isEqualTo("{\"status\":\"UP\"}"). }
